body_html: @vrv ok thanks, that is what I'm currently doing and it seems to work fine. I started writing my TF code with 0.5 and so everything is very close to the metal, without any of the fancy new stuff like the Supervisor framework. Perhaps at some point I'll refactor, but so far I've gotten away with it! ;-)
